column4: when i use synaptic to install some packages it asks me to insert the ubuntu cd-rom but i want to download them from the internet
so, configure apt to not use the cd.  if you're using synaptic, use the repository manager thing to not use the cd
otherwise, comment it out in /etc/apt/sources.list
